detectors.description:
Core2Rebase.transfer(address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Core2Rebase.sol#36-45) may have integer overflow
	Possible nodes:
	- balances[msg.sender] -= value (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Core2Rebase.sol#38)
	- balances[to] += value (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Core2Rebase.sol#39)

detectors.description:
Core2Rebase.transferFrom(address,address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Core2Rebase.sol#47-57) may have integer overflow
	Possible nodes:
	- balances[to] += value (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Core2Rebase.sol#49)
	- balances[from] -= value (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Core2Rebase.sol#50)
	- allowed[from][msg.sender] -= value (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Core2Rebase.sol#51)

detectors.description:

	- ERC20.totalSupply() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Core2Rebase.sol#4)

allowance(address,address) should be declared external:

	- ERC20.allowance(address,address) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Core2Rebase.sol#6)

approve(address,uint256) should be declared external:

	- ERC20.approve(address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Core2Rebase.sol#8)

transfer(address,uint256) should be declared external:

	- ERC20.transfer(address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Core2Rebase.sol#9)
